Class StoneChain

java.lang.Object
lista4.gameLogic.StoneChain
public class StoneChain extends Object
Represents a chain of connected stones of the same color on the board.

A StoneChain keeps track of all stones in the chain and allows operations such as merging with another chain, checking if the chain is dead (no breaths), and capturing (removing) the stones from the board.

    Creates a new stone chain with a single initial stone.

  • Constructor Details

    • StoneChain

      public StoneChain(Stone initial)
      Creates a new stone chain with a single initial stone.
      Parameters:
      initial - The initial stone to start the chain

  • Method Details

    • addStone

      public void addStone(Stone s)
      Adds a stone to this chain. Also sets the stone's chain reference to this.
      Parameters:
      s - The stone to add

    • merge

      public void merge(StoneChain other)
      Merges another StoneChain into this one. All stones in the other chain are added to this chain.
      Parameters:
      other - The other chain to merge

    • getBreathCount

      public int getBreathCount()
      Calculates the total number of "breaths" (empty neighboring fields) for all stones in the chain.
      Returns:
      Number of breaths

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the chain is dead (no remaining breaths).
      Returns:
      true if the chain is dead, false otherwise

    • captureChain

      public void captureChain()
      Captures all stones in this chain by removing them from the board.

    • getStones

      public Set<Stone> getStones()
      Returns the set of stones in this chain.
      Returns:
      Set of stones
